title: FieldGroup
caption: A component for organizing and structuring form data on the layout level.

body.raw:
The `<FieldGroup>` designed primarily for handling of complex forms and semantic representation of fields structure and the layout in `theme-core` .

<Message messageTitle="For your information !" variant="info">
The `<FieldGroup>` is a component to layout the label and the fieldbase itself. On that you can use `labelWidth` which is a string type to set the width of the label. Because the label is set to the left side in the `core-theme`, it has only an impact on that.
</Message>

## Usage

### Import

To import the component you just have to use this code below.

```tsx onlyCode
import { FieldGroup } from '@marigold/components';
```

### Appearance

<AppearanceTable component={title} />

### Props

<PropsTable
  props={[
    {
      property: 'labelWidth',
      type: 'string | number',
      description:
        'Sets the width of all Fields labels used inside the `FieldGroup` ',
      default: 'none',
    },
  ]}
/>

## Examples

### Complex Form layout

This is how you can control form layout and labels width using `FieldGroup` component.

<ComponentDemo file="./field-group-basic.demo.tsx" />
body.code:

`,(0,l.jsx)(t,{file:"./field-group-basic.demo.tsx",name:"field-group-basic",source:`import { coreTheme } from '@/theme';
import { MarigoldProvider } from '@/ui';

import {
  Checkbox,
  CheckboxGroup,
  FieldBase,
  FieldGroup,
  Input,
  Radio,
  RadioGroup,
  Select,
  TextField,
} from '@marigold/components';

export default () => (
  <MarigoldProvider theme={coreTheme}>
    <FieldGroup labelWidth="150px">
      <FieldBase label="First Name">
        <Input />
      </FieldBase>
      <FieldBase label="Last Name">
        <input type="text" />
      </FieldBase>
      <TextField type="email" label="Email" />
      <TextField
        type="tel"
        label="Phone Number"
        description="Please enter your phone number"
      />
      <Select label="Country">
        <Select.Option key="usa">USA</Select.Option>
        <Select.Option key="canada">Canada</Select.Option>
      </Select>
      <RadioGroup label="Preferred Language">
        <Radio value="english">English</Radio>
        <Radio value="spanish">Spanish</Radio>
      </RadioGroup>
      <CheckboxGroup label="Hobbies">
        <Checkbox value="reading">Reading</Checkbox>
        <Checkbox value="painting">Painting</Checkbox>
      </CheckboxGroup>
    </FieldGroup>
  </MarigoldProvider>
);
`,children:(0,l.jsx)(e.div,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"",children:(0,l.jsx)(e.pre,{"data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"default",raw:`import { coreTheme } from '@/theme';

} from '@marigold/components';

export default () => (
  <MarigoldProvider theme={coreTheme}>
    <FieldGroup labelWidth="150px">
      <FieldBase label="First Name">
        <Input />
      </FieldBase>
      <FieldBase label="Last Name">
        <input type="text" />
      </FieldBase>
      <TextField type="email" label="Email" />
      <TextField
        type="tel"
        label="Phone Number"
        description="Please enter your phone number"
      />
      <Select label="Country">
        <Select.Option key="usa">USA</Select.Option>
        <Select.Option key="canada">Canada</Select.Option>
      </Select>
      <RadioGroup label="Preferred Language">
        <Radio value="english">English</Radio>
        <Radio value="spanish">Spanish</Radio>
      </RadioGroup>
      <CheckboxGroup label="Hobbies">
        <Checkbox value="reading">Reading</Checkbox>
        <Checkbox value="painting">Painting</Checkbox>
      </CheckboxGroup>
    </FieldGroup>
  </MarigoldProvider>
);
